Html:
Hi.

I used Wintellect's Power Collections for my .NET CF projects (recompiled against .NET CF 2.0 without Serializable attribute and replaced just one native call with same implementation for .NET CF). I can provide source code changes for it (paths). If somebody plans to official .NET CF 2.0 support for library where i can send paths?

Best regards,
Zaripov Rinat .

Hi!

I know it's a bit late, but it would be great if you could share your changes.
Either upload or via email ( giggsy@gmx.at )

Thanks in advance!

Christian

Hi.

I sent it to you.

If someone else need's that library, just ask.

Best regards,
RZ.

Hello Zaripov

I am looking to use some of the reader writer locks from the power threading library in my compact framework 2.0 app.

Do you still have access to the compilation you made, and could email me them?

Many thanks

Paul
